modName: Ultimate Skyrim Lighting Without ENB Guide
summary: This is a very simple tweak that can be made to Skyrim to make it look like its running an enb when its not.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffc000][font=Impact][size=6]Ultimate Skyrim Lighting[/size][/font][/color][color=#ffc000][font=Impact][size=6]
[/size][/font][/color][font=Comic Sans MS]

Do you want your Skyrim to run an ENB but your computer can't handle it? Maybe want a bit of stability? This is a small tweak you can make to Skyrim to make it look amazing. Now this guide is a simple MCM Menu tweak that some don't know about. If you don't, lucky you found this. In Vivid Weathers there are two important tweaks that can be done to make the game look like its running enb when it isn't. For the screenshots they're just this tweak and Skyrim HD 2k LITE textures. I also am using ELFX in the screenshots however I don't think it had an effect in that scenery. The only downside to this is without ENB you're missing out on its shadow tweaks which is worth not having for this. This tweak looks exactly like "Tetrachromatic ENB for Vivid Weathers" in my opinion from many hours of using such ENB. The second mod listed is simply to add sun rays that are missing from having no ENB.[/font]

[color=#ffff00][font=Impact][size=6]FPS GAIN?[/size][/font][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Using "Tetrachromatic ENB for Vivid Weathers" on lowest setting I got an average of 32 FPS. With this tweak I'm averaging 55-60 FPS outdoors! I also use Vivid Weathers using Medium Textures(1k) and no weather fog effects.[/font]

My PC Specs:
GTX 750ti(no overclock)
i5 4690
16gb ddr3 RAM
[color=#ffc000][font=Impact][size=6][color=#ff0000][font=Impact][size=6][u]Requirements[/u][/size][/font][/color]
[/size][/font][/color][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS]Vivid Weathers: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?
MCM TWEAKS for Vivid Weathers: Change Saturation to High and Bloom to Ultra(THATS IT!)
ReAL Sun - insane0h Realistic Sunglare: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/866/?[/font]
[color=#00b0f0][size=6][u][font=Impact]Installation[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/u][/size][/color][font=Comic Sans MS]Simply install Vivid Weather  and ReAL Sun with any mod manager of your choice.[/font]
[u][size=5]
Credits[/size][/u]

[font=Comic Sans MS]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2645612/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1632043/?[/font][/center]
author: Charmareian
